The subject line of the email from the R: which was designed to grab attention, claimed that "Fidel Castro endorses Obama."
The email contained a doctored image of: I love this guy!" above him, suggesting an endorsement.
The email included a link to an article: qualified endorsement" and referred to him as the "most advanced candidate" in a Communist newspaper commentary.
